name: BetterWeather
0:
”Alexa, open better weather”
”Alexa, launch better weather”
”Alexa, play better weather”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: better weather
des: Alexa provides a quick forecast by default, but sometimes you need to know more: like the wind chill, the heat index, or the fact it'll be colder in the afternoon than it was in the morning. Better Weather gives you that information, from public data provided by the US National Weather Service.
